title: Hey, can I cover up small red tattoo with white ink? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are your reasons for wanting it covered up need more info. White it is harder to use let alone to use as a cover up.

The short answer? No The long answer? Tattoo ink is translucent so darker colors will show through lighter colors. Also tattoos are not done in actual layers. The inks mix in the skin so putting white over red will result in pink.
